English: He's like a fish in the water, He's in his element somewhere.
Hungarian: Olyan, mint a hal a vízben

English: Jealousy removes the fish from the water as well, When you're jealous you see nothing positive anymore.
Hungarian: A féltékenység még a halakat is eltávolítja a vízből

Finnish: Ei kala miestä hae, jollei mies kalaa
English: A fish won't try to get a man if the man doesn't try to get the fish, If you want something, you have to go for it.
Hungarian: A hal nem keres embert, ha az ember nem keresi a halat

Finnish: Isoa kalaa kannattaa pyytää, vaikkei aina saisikaan
English: You should ask for a big fish, even if you don't get it, It's always worth asking for something.
Hungarian: Érdemes nagy halat kérni, még ha nem is kapod meg

Finnish: Tyynessä vedessä ne suuret kalat kutevat
English: It's in still waters that the big fish spawn, Still waters run deep
Hungarian: A nagy halak nyugodt vizekben ívnak
